TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RectangleHotSpot extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot
Public NotInheritable Class RectangleHotSpot Inherits HotSpot
public ref class RectangleHotSpot sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpot

summary.span: 定義 控制項中的矩形作用點區域。

span.span: Defines a rectangular hot spot region in an control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別定義中的矩形作用點區域控制項。This class defines a rectangular hot spot region in an control. 若要定義的區域物件，設定屬性設為值，表示矩形的區域頂端的 x 座標的左上角。To define the region of the object, set the property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner. 設定屬性設為值，表示矩形區域上方的 y 座標的左上角。Set the property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner. 設定屬性設為表示的矩形區域下方右上角的 x 座標的值。Set the property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner. 一組屬性設為值，表示右上角的矩形區域下方的 y 座標。Set of the property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner. 當按一下控制項、 頁面巡覽至 URL，會產生回傳至伺服器，或不執行任何動作。When a control is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing. 屬性會指定此行為。The property specifies this behavior. 若要瀏覽至 URL，將屬性，以`HotSpotMode.Navigate`並用屬性來指定要巡覽至 URL。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate` and use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要張貼至伺服器，設定屬性，以`HotSpotMode.PostBack`並用屬性，以指定的名稱物件。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack` and use the property to specify a name for the object. 此名稱將會傳入事件資料時按下。This name will be passed in the event data when the is clicked. 。. 如果您想物件沒有任何行為，請設定屬性設`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式建立控制項，其中包含兩個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，會使頁面回傳至伺服器每次使用者按一下其中一個作用點區域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 每次使用者按一下其中一個物件，呼叫方法，並選取作用點的座標會向使用者顯示。Each time the user clicks one of the objects, the method is called and the coordinates of the selected hot spot are displayed to the user. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立兩個物件，設定其屬性，並將其新增控制項的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create two objects, set their properties, and add them to the control's collection. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Cstr/CS/rectanglehotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Cstr/VB/rectanglehotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定由這個 物件定義之矩形區域下方的 Y 軸。

span.span: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object.

value.span: 矩形區域下方的 Y 軸由這個 物件定義。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您取得或設定值，表示由這個定義之矩形區域下方的 y 座標物件。The property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object. 若要完整定義物件，您必須指定值，這個屬性以及， ，和屬性。To completely define a object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the , , and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式建立控制項，其中包含兩個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 一會以宣告方式建立物件和其屬性，包括屬性，以宣告方式設定。One object is created declaratively and its properties, including the property, are set declaratively. 另以程式設計方式建立物件和其屬性，包括屬性，以程式設計方式設定。The other object is created programmatically and its properties, including the property, are set programmatically. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.Top#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Top/CS/rectanglehotspot.topcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.Top#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Top/VB/rectanglehotspot.topvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetCoordinates() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetCoordinates () As String

summary.span: 傳回字串，表示 物件左上角的 X 和 Y 軸及其右下角的 X 和 Y 軸。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the x -and y-coordinates of a object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.

returns.span: 字串，表示 物件左上角的 X 和 Y 軸及其右下角的 X 和 Y 軸。

span.span: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回字串，表示的座標物件的左上角和及其右下座標右下角。This method returns a string that represents the coordinates of a object's top left corner and the coordinates of its bottom right corner. 這個方法會使用指派給的值和屬性傳回的頂端座標的左上角。This method uses the values assigned to the and properties to return the coordinates for the top left corner. 它會使用指派給的值和返回右下角下方的座標屬性。It uses the values assigned to the and properties to return the coordinates for the bottom right corner. 方法在內部 ASP.NET 用來取得要使用的座標文字呈現時。The method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a when it is rendered. 所傳回的字串是特定的瀏覽器和標記的語言。The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式建立控制項，其中包含兩個物件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 屬性設定為`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，會使頁面回傳至伺服器每次使用者按一下其中一個作用點區域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 每次使用者按一下其中一個物件，呼叫方法，並選取作用點的座標會向使用者顯示。Each time the user clicks one of the objects, the method is called and the coordinates of the selected hot spot are displayed to the user. 此範例正常運作中，您必須提供自己的映像，如屬性並更新路徑到映像適當地使應用程式可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates/CS/rectanglehotspot.getcoordinatescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates/VB/rectanglehotspot.getcoordinatesvb.aspx#1)]
